name: Soul, Please! Darkest dungeon
description:
Скачать видео

You are Death, soul knight, who knows no fear. Every day you send thousands of souls to the another world. But the leaving dead...decided to break the usual order. To return to the live world, ghosts must kidnap your...dark soul.
The Dark Knight, Lord of Darkness, the Guardian, you have an important mission. Do not let evil spirits escape from the crypt. Prove your power in insane battle!

This will help you:

* Shotgun.

* Development of abilities: explosion, acceleration, magnet, attraction, restoration of health.

* Another shotgun.

* Beautiful soundtrack.

P.S. You can try it game on Android!
